channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Tom Quinn (actor)
item.description: Thomas Michael Quinn (April 28, 1934, in Queens, New York â€“ January 5, 2014, in Teaneck, New Jersey) was an American actor who appeared in numerous small roles on television and in various films, including a stint as Detective Patrick Mahon on HBO's The Wire. Quinn had small roles in the films Major League II and Super 8, as well as an episode of The West Wing. He portrayed Coach Bell in The Hammer. Quinn died in 2014 at age 79 from complications of diabetes.
